CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​MenuEntries.​Files.​Folder
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​MenuEntries.​Base.​Container
public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​MenuEntries.​Files.​Folder

Represents a folder or group of folders in a Menu.  It will only represent a group of folders ("FolderA/FolderB") if the parent folder contains nothing other than the child folder.

Functions

public Folder (
Path pathFromFileSource
)
Condense
override public void Condense ()
Properties
PathFromFileSource
public Path PathFromFileSource { get }

The relative path from the file source to the folder associated with this entry.  The path will otherwise be complete so you don't have to combine it with parent paths, only with the file source if you want to get an absolute path.

pathFromFileSource
protected Path pathFromFileSource
